step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ADAS_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM ADAS_LINK P WHERE P.RDLINK_PID = 0 AND P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ADAS_LINK (PID) (SELECT LINK_PID FROM ADAS_LINK WHERE RDLINK_PID = 0 AND SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ADAS_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM ADAS_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.RDLINK_PID = T.PID AND T.PID <> 0);

INSERT INTO TEMP_ADAS_NODE_INFO (SELECT P.NODE_PID, P.IN_LINK_PID, P.OUT_LINK_PID FROM ADAS_NODE_INFO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADAS_LINK L, TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE L.LINK_PID = T.PID AND P.IN_LINK_PID = T.PID) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADAS_LINK L, TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE L.LINK_PID = T.PID AND P.OUT_LINK_PID = T.PID));

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_ADAS_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.NODE_PID FROM ADAS_NODE P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADAS_LINK L, TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE L.LINK_PID = T.PID AND (P.NODE_PID = L.S_NODE_PID OR P.NODE_PID = L.E_NODE_PID)));
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_LINK P,TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_LINK_GEOMETRY P,TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_NODE P,TEMP_ADAS_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_NODE_MESH P,TEMP_ADAS_NODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_SLOPE P,TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;

SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_NODE_INFO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADAS_LINK L, TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE L.LINK_PID = T.PID AND P.IN_LINK_PID=T.PID) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ADAS_LINK L, TEMP_ADAS_LINK T WHERE L.LINK_PID = T.PID AND P.OUT_LINK_PID=T.PID);
DELETE FROM ADAS_NODE_INFO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_ADAS_NODE_INFO F WHERE F.NODE_PID = P.NODE_PID AND P.IN_LINK_PID = F.IN_LINK_PID AND P.OUT_LINK_PID = F.OUT_LINK_PID);
DELETE FROM ADAS_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ADAS_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ADAS_LINK_GEOMETRY P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ADAS_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ADAS_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ADAS_NODE T );
DELETE FROM ADAS_SLOPE P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ADAS_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ADAS_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_ADAS_NODE T );
